page.title: 15COUNTRY HOUSES,ST.ALLEN.
page.content: Houses with a few acres,often mills or large old farmhouses split off from farms,are popular with hospital consultants from Truro.Tretherres' imposing 5-bedroom farmhouse sold in 1971 with 4 acres,(the 130acre farm has a modern bungalow) to a consultant physician & clinical medical officer, now with 4 children.It retains 2 stair cases,cloam oven in the dining-room fireplace,indoor pump for well-water. A new kitchen,mains water& electricity were installed in 1972_luxuries to the elderly former tenantfarmer occupants. A bacteriologist,his wife & 3 children live at comfortably modernised Tremeneth,Idless valley;their 5\ acres leased to a dairy-farmer for grazing. Lanner Mill,now converted & extended to a splendid part-timber-clad stone 4-bedroom luxury home,is for sale with 3acres & lake for Â£130,000.
